title: [又絕無此事] 遭警指控曾收 BB 彈槍涉藏彈藥　A 貨金正恩：從未收取，因諷刺中共被濫捕

Howard 表示，被帶到警署後他曾質疑警方這次拘捕行動毫無根據，「他們卻強調這次命令是來自更高級的部門，他們只是工作而已」。

Howard 又稱，警方曾提到他去年多次出現在遊行或公眾活動現場，例如 7.1 遊行以及 10.1 遊行當日他都有出現在 IFC。因此，Howard 懷疑這次拘捕根本不是因為 BB 彈槍。

他在聲明中寫道：「在我看來, 這是針對我過去幾年對中共政府的諷刺批評所作出的任意逮捕, 這次逮捕不僅是為了騷擾我, 而且藉機收集我的指紋並搜屋。」

Press Release - Kim Jong Un impersonator arrested by Hong Kong Police

I was arrested by the HK police at my home on Oct 28th 2020. They had a warrant to search my home because according to them, a BB gun had been posted to my address in April 2020 to which I never actually received.

Around 10 policemen came to raid the apartment and the official reason for the arrest was “possession of a firearm without license”.

BB guns are legal in HK however they said that particular BB gun had an energy output beyond what was legally allowed and therefore is considered in the same category as a real firearm.

However nothing was found and I was taken away for processing at the airport branch police station.

The police had full knowledge of who I was and some were even fans of my work. When I challenged them on the arrest on such ridiculous grounds, they had indicated that the order came from another department higher up and stated they were just doing their jobs.

During my conversations with the police, they also referred to my satirical appearances at public demonstrations that I had made throughout the year in 2020 including my appearance at IFC, July 1st and Oct 1st in support of the democracy protesters, which points to my suspicions that this arrest was not really about the bb gun.

As a professional impersonator of Kim Jong Un I often make use and own a number of replica BB guns, missiles and nuclear bombs for my performances and videos.

In my opinion this was an arbitrary arrest for my satirical critique of the CCP government in the years past and this arrest is being used as a tool not only to harass but to also take my finger prints (every person who gets arrested have their prints taken) had my iphone confiscated and my home searched.

I have not yet been charged and had to pay for bail and report back to the police station every 6 weeks. I will once again have to report to them today - where they will have the option to either charge me, drop the case or make me report back in another 6 weeks.

Since I was made to report to the station back in December, I made sure that it was documented and arrived in character at the police station with my rocket to highlight the ridiculous grounds of my arrest.

Please DM me if you need to know further details.

Howard X
